instructions.reason_for_call:
You ordered a fleece jacket by mistake and want to remove it from your pending order. If removing one item is not possible, cancel the whole order, it is important that you state the reason for cancelling was ordered by mistake. You also want to modify the skateboard to maple material, 34 inch, graphic. If that is not possible, cancel the order since you no longer need this one. 
Finally, you also want to know the total price for all the grills you have bought in previous orders.
instructions.known_info: You name is Ava Nguyen and your zip code is 94128.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address

Is there anything else I can help you with today?'

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm a bit busy, but I was hoping you could help me with a pending order of mine. I accidentally added a fleece jacket to it and I'd really like to remove it if possible!

message.content: Hi there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm a bit busy, but I was hoping you could help me with a pending order of mine. I accidentally added a fleece jacket to it and I'd really like to remove it if possible!

messages.content: I'd be happy to help you with that! To get started, I'll need to authenticate your account. Could you please provide the email address associated with your order? Alternatively, I can look you up using your first and last name along with your zip code.
